content: I think I'll go with Knives Out. I've been meaning to see it for a while now, and it sounds like it'll be a fun and engaging movie for my friends and me. Thanks for the suggestion! By the way, I've been meaning to organize my apartment and have a game night or potluck dinner soon, but I need to clean up and declutter first. Do you have any tips on how to declutter and organize my living space quickly and efficiently?
